page.title: 05Employment and Mobility 2
page.content: Other towns and villages include Waddingham, Kirton Lindsey, Redbourne, Scotter, Elsham, Alford, Blyton, Gainsthorpe, Barnetby, Cadney, Manton, and South Killingholme. Employment within the village accounts for only 17% of those surveyed.These jobs as expected are mostly associated with agriculture with several farm workers, a stockman and a farm manager.Other village industries surprisingly employ few workers from our village.Only one lorry driver, no workers from Sargents ice creams and one hotel manageress. We also found some interesting answers with our mobility questions.We discovered the majoriy of families have come to the village from elsewhere within 5 years, mostly from nearby villages,Brigg and Scunthorpe.
